name: Mutation City
description:

Espace = go next layer and game

In the year 2070 an evil scientist creates an interdimensional portal bringing various creatures and characters from different eras, this causing total chaos in the city, escaping from creatures, saruk (main character) after seeing a few policemen being devoured by some kind of creatures mutant dragon, runs for the weapon, getting and leaving quickly, and meets Suika (female, secondary character), who also fled from creatures
